content:
Great! The next step is to create an Amplify project using the following command:
```csharp
amplify init
```
This will prompt you to enter a name for your project, the environment you want to use (dev, test, prod, etc.), the default text editor to use, and the AWS profile you want to use.

Once you've entered all the required information, the Amplify CLI will create an Amplify project in your AWS account and set up the necessary files in your local directory.
